services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.subtitle: We handle your delivery with professionalism.

card1.title: GROUND TRANSPORT
card1.description: Price and quality of services is key for us. Selecting Duda Transport you choose the highest quality at the best rate.

card2.title: TRUCKING SERVICE
card2.description: Modern vehicle fleet, adjusted to the carriage of small and big shipments. All our vans are equipped with GPS navigation so as to track their current position.

card3.title: CARGO
card3.description: By using our own fleet, as well as cooperation with several reliable partners, we provide express transport throughout all Europe.

card4.title: DOCUMENTS
card4.description: We have all the necessary permits, licenses and certificates confirming our competence and attention to areas such as quality management.

fleet.title: OUR FLEET
fleet.subtitle: These are the vehices we drive:

truck1.name: RENAULT MASTER
truck1.description: The Renault Master is the best of commercial vehicles. For our needs, it is practical, tough and versatile. It is efficient with space, boasting load volumes of up to 26m3 and payloads of up to 1,400kg.

truck2.name: FIAT DUCATO
truck2.description: We have been trusting Fiat Ducato for years and we trust on their reliability. It's key features are it's 26m3 load compartment and it's 1.4t load capacity.

truck3.name: RENAULT MASTER
truck3.description: The Renault Master is the best of commercial vehicles. For our needs, it is practical, tough and versatile. It is efficient with space, boasting load volumes of up to 21m3 and payloads of up to 1,400kg.
